required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Knee Nerve Cryoneurolysis and Impact on Pain After Prosthetic Surgery
clinical_study.official_title: Cryoneurolysis of the Saphenous Nerve or Geniculate Nerves: Impact on Postoperative Pain and Rehabilitation in Prosthetic Knee Surgery

lead_sponsor.agency: GCS Ramsay Santé pour l'Enseignement et la Recherche

clinical_study.source: GCS Ramsay Santé pour l'Enseignement et la Recherche

brief_summary.textblock: Interventional, comparative, randomized, controlled study versus standard treatment, in 3 parallel groups, monocentric, aiming to demonstrate the superiority of preoperative cryoneurolysis versus no procedure, in patients operated on for knee arthroplasty and receiving standard analgesia.

primary_outcome.measure: 90 ° flexion pain 2 days after the arthroscopy
primary_outcome.description: Evaluation of the knee pain at 90° flexion with a visual analogic scale of 100 mm

secondary_outcome.measure: 90 ° flexion pain 1 day after the arthroscopy
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation of the knee pain at 90° flexion with a visual analogic scale of 100 mm

secondary_outcome.measure: 90 ° flexion pain 7 days after the arthroscopy
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation of the knee pain at 90° flexion with a visual analogic scale of 100 mm

secondary_outcome.measure: 90 ° flexion pain 30 days after the arthroscopy
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation of the knee pain at 90° flexion with a visual analogic scale of 100 mm

secondary_outcome.measure: 90 ° flexion pain 90 days after the arthroscopy
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation of the knee pain at 90° flexion with a visual analogic scale of 100 mm
Knee pain after intervention with a visual analogic scale of 100 mm
Knee pain after intervention with a visual analogic scale of 100 mm
Knee pain after intervention with a visual analogic scale of 100 mm
Knee pain after intervention with a visual analogic scale of 100 mm
Knee pain after intervention with a visual analogic scale of 100 mm

arm_group.description: A cryoneurolysis of the saphenous nerve will be performed between 7 days and 5 days before the knee arthroplasty
A cryoneurolysis of geniculate nerves will be performed between 7 days and 5 days before the knee arthroplasty
No cryoneurolysis will be performed before the knee arthroplasty

intervention.description: Knee arthroscopy will be performed ansd patients will receive standard pain relievers in confomtity with the current practice
intervention.other_name: Standard pain relievers in accordance with the current practice
